verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARG1: he was still looking at a June 12 summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore] , [ARGM-ADV: adding that talks were progressing very well.</p >]
< p > U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday he [V: was] still looking at a June 12 summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore , adding that talks were progressing very well.</p >
